<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107126</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107126</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101522</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Cloudmakers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Cloudmakers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Cloudmakers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Cloudmakers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Cloudmakers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Cloudmakers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Cloudmakers</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Biological activity in the oceans might make the difference between clear skies and cloudy, Scripps researchers say.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologische Aktivität in den Ozeanen konnte 
zwischen freien Himmeln unterscheiden und bewölkt, sagen Scripps 
Forscher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'activité biologique dans les océans pourrait 
faire la différence entre les cieux clairs et nuageux, les chercheurs
de Scripps disent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A atividade biológica nos oceanos pôde fazer a 
diferença entre céus desobstruídos e cloudy, os investigadores de 
Scripps dizem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'attività biologica negli oceani potrebbe fare 
la differenza fra i cieli liberi e nuvoloso, i ricercatori di Scripps 
dicono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογική δραστηριότητα στους ωκεανούς να κάνει τη 
διαφορά μεταξύ των σαφών ουρανών και νεφελώδης, οι ερευνητές 
Scripps λένε.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La actividad biológica en los océanos pudo 
diferenciar entre los cielos claros y nublado, los investigadores de 
Scripps dicen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SCRIPPS INSTITUTION OF OCEANOGRAPHY
FN:SCRIPPS INSTITUTION OF OCEANOGRAPHY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101522</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107126</entry>
    </identifier>
